item.title: Schubert D946 No.1
item.description: Here is an interesting article about the history of Franz Schubert’s Klavierst√ºcke in E flat minor for Piano (D946, No.1) on Henle Blog: Schubert deletes, Brahms restores. On the first of the three posthumous piano pieces (Impromptus) D 946 by Franz Schubert
